items.title: Awesome V
items.content_text:
### Command-line

*   [github-releases (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/Dracks/repo-download-asset) - Cli tool to keep track of applications released as GitHub Release (or assets in workflow) and download them.
*   [portctl (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/apoprotsky/portctl) - CLI tool to manage Docker Swarm resources using Portainer API.
*   [vcli (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/changhz/vcli) - A CLI tool to generate folder structure according to the [guideline](https://blog.vlang.io/the-complete-beginners-guide-to-cli-apps-in-v/)
*   [vgoogle (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/changhz/vgoogle) - Make google search on the terminal.
*   [vindex (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/wenxuanjun/vindex) - A simple file list server generating json strings, compatible with nginx's autoindex module.

### Graphics

*   [vRayTracer (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/ali-raheem/vraytracer) - A simple ray tracer written in V.
*   [V\_sokol\_gp (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/mohamedLT/V_sokol_gp) - A V wrapper for the sokol\_gp library for easy and fast 2d graphics.
*   [vsdl2 (‚≠ê46)](https://github.com/nsauzede/vsdl2) - A libSDL2 wrapper.

### Interpreters/Compilers

*   [stas (‚≠ê58)](https://github.com/l1mey112/stas/tree/0.1.0-v-compiler) - A stack based compiled programming language. The bootstrap compiler is written in V.
*   [v (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/vlang/v) - V itself. Simple, fast, safe, compiled language for developing maintainable software.
*   [vas (‚≠ê99)](https://github.com/v420v/vas) - A simple x86-64 assembler written in V.

### Serialization

*   [vlang-yaml (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/jdonnerstag/vlang-yaml) - A V-native YAML reader, incl. YAML-to-JSON converter.
*   [vproto (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/emily33901/vproto) - Protobuf compiler and runtime in V.

### Web

*   [v-admin-skeleton (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/xiusin/v-system-skeleton) - Backend skeleton written in V.
*   [v-jsonrpc (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/nedpals/v-jsonrpc) - Basic JSON-RPC 2.0-compliant server written on V.
*   [v-tiktok](https://github.com/walkingdevel/v-tiktok) - A V library for downloading TikTok videos.

### Game development

*   [vraylib (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/MajorHard/vraylib) - V wrapper (bindings) for raylib, the C game development framework.

### User Interface toolkits

*   [V UI (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/vlang/ui) - Integrated cross platform UI toolkit for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS and the web.

### Editor plugins / Emacs

*   [vlang-mode.el (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/Naheel-Azawy/vlang-mode.el) - Emacs major mode for the V programming language.

### Editor plugins / Vim

*   [vim-v (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/cheap-glitch/vim-v) - Quality syntax highlighting for the V programming language.

### GitHub templates / Vim

*   [v-project-basement (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/ArtemkaKun/v-project-basement) - A basement for every V project, that contains universal minimum GitHub CI scripts and issue templates for a V project.

### Patterns / Vim

*   [MVU.v (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/ArtemkaKun/MVU.v) - MVU pattern (The Elm Architecture) implemented in V programming language.

### Programming contests / Vim

*   [Advent of Code 2022 (‚≠ê45)](https://github.com/vlang/adventofcode) - Solution of Advent of Code 2022 in V.
items.content_html:
Command-line

  • github-releases (‚≠ê6) - Cli tool to keep track of applications released as GitHub Release (or assets in workflow) and download them.
  • portctl (‚≠ê9) - CLI tool to manage Docker Swarm resources using Portainer API.
  • vcli (‚≠ê3) - A CLI tool to generate folder structure according to the guideline
  • vgoogle (‚≠ê9) - Make google search on the terminal.
  • vindex (‚≠ê5) - A simple file list server generating json strings, compatible with nginx's autoindex module.

Graphics

  • vRayTracer (‚≠ê49) - A simple ray tracer written in V.
  • V_sokol_gp (‚≠ê4) - A V wrapper for the sokol_gp library for easy and fast 2d graphics.
  • vsdl2 (‚≠ê46) - A libSDL2 wrapper.

Interpreters/Compilers

  • stas (‚≠ê58) - A stack based compiled programming language. The bootstrap compiler is written in V.
  • v (‚≠ê37k) - V itself. Simple, fast, safe, compiled language for developing maintainable software.
  • vas (‚≠ê99) - A simple x86-64 assembler written in V.

Serialization

  • vlang-yaml (‚≠ê27) - A V-native YAML reader, incl. YAML-to-JSON converter.
  • vproto (‚≠ê56) - Protobuf compiler and runtime in V.

Web

  • v-admin-skeleton (‚≠ê14) - Backend skeleton written in V.
  • v-jsonrpc (‚≠ê35) - Basic JSON-RPC 2.0-compliant server written on V.
  • v-tiktok - A V library for downloading TikTok videos.

Game development

  • vraylib (‚≠ê49) - V wrapper (bindings) for raylib, the C game development framework.

User Interface toolkits

  • V UI (‚≠ê2.4k) - Integrated cross platform UI toolkit for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS and the web.

Editor plugins / Emacs

  • vlang-mode.el (‚≠ê13) - Emacs major mode for the V programming language.

Editor plugins / Vim

  • vim-v (‚≠ê25) - Quality syntax highlighting for the V programming language.

GitHub templates / Vim

  • v-project-basement (‚≠ê13) - A basement for every V project, that contains universal minimum GitHub CI scripts and issue templates for a V project.

Patterns / Vim

  • MVU.v (‚≠ê5) - MVU pattern (The Elm Architecture) implemented in V programming language.

Programming contests / Vim

  • Advent of Code 2022 (‚≠ê45) - Solution of Advent of Code 2022 in V.

items.title: Open Source Flutter Apps
items.content_text:
### Contents / Health and Fitness

*   [Open Food Facts (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/openfoodfacts/smooth-app) - The new mobile app of Open Food Facts, with other 2 million installs, that allows you to understand the health and environmental impact of your food, as well as to contribute new products to the Open Database [Open Food facts](https://github.com/openfoodfacts/)

### Contents / Media

*   [BlackHole (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/Sangwan5688/BlackHole) - A Music Player App made with Flutter by [Ankit Sangwan](https://github.com/Sangwan5688).

### Contents / Tools

*   [EncrytX (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/musfique113/EncryptX) - Encrypt and protect your text with ease using advanced ciphers including Caesar, Affine, Playfair, and RSA encryption in this all-in-one Android app by [Musfique](https://github.com/musfique113)
items.content_html:
Contents / Health and Fitness

  • Open Food Facts (‚≠ê1.1k) - The new mobile app of Open Food Facts, with other 2 million installs, that allows you to understand the health and environmental impact of your food, as well as to contribute new products to the Open Database Open Food facts

Contents / Media

  • BlackHole (‚≠ê25) - A Music Player App made with Flutter by Ankit Sangwan.

Contents / Tools

  • EncrytX (‚≠ê8) - Encrypt and protect your text with ease using advanced ciphers including Caesar, Affine, Playfair, and RSA encryption in this all-in-one Android app by Musfique

items.title: Awesome Fiber
items.content_text:
### ‚öôÔ∏è Middlewares / üß¨ Core

*   [Adaptor (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/adaptor) - Converter for net/http handlers to/from Fiber request handlers.
*   [Earlydata (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/earlydata) - Early data support for Fiber.
*   [Helmet (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/helmet) - Helps secure your apps by setting various HTTP headers.
*   [Idempotency (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/idempotency) - Idempotency middleware for Fiber allows for fault-tolerant APIs where duplicate requests.
*   [Keyauth (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/keyauth) - Key auth middleware provides a key based authentication.
*   [Redirect (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/redirect) - Redirect middleware for Fiber.
*   [Rewrite (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/rewrite) - Rewrite middleware rewrites the URL path based on provided rules. It can be helpful for backward compatibility or just creating cleaner and more descriptive links.
items.content_html:
‚öôÔ∏è Middlewares / üß¨ Core

  • Adaptor (‚≠ê37k) - Converter for net/http handlers to/from Fiber request handlers.
  • Earlydata (‚≠ê37k) - Early data support for Fiber.
  • Helmet (‚≠ê37k) - Helps secure your apps by setting various HTTP headers.
  • Idempotency (‚≠ê37k) - Idempotency middleware for Fiber allows for fault-tolerant APIs where duplicate requests.
  • Keyauth (‚≠ê37k) - Key auth middleware provides a key based authentication.
  • Redirect (‚≠ê37k) - Redirect middleware for Fiber.
  • Rewrite (‚≠ê37k) - Rewrite middleware rewrites the URL path based on provided rules. It can be helpful for backward compatibility or just creating cleaner and more descriptive links.
